description: The ban on non-residents entering the Isle of Man has given islanders a "definite appetite" for local acts.
title: Isle of Man Covid-19 rules give islanders 'definite appetite' for local acts
title_page: Isle of Man Covid-19 rules give islanders 'definite appetite' for local acts - BBC News
maintext: John Bethall, who runs the Erin Arts Centre in Port Erin, said the venue's first live music event on Sunday had been "well attended" and he was hoping to put "more local artists on the stage" in the coming months.
